1.title: Hack the Tao
1.description: Hack the Tao is the first art game experience designed by the Italian artist duo, Hackatao, for The Sandbox game

2.title: Shinytures: Finding The Lost Creatures
2.description: Shinytures: Finding The Lost Creatures is an adventure in which you can get mesmerized by accomplishing the missions you are given as a member of the spatial organization.

3.title: Viking Fjord
3.description: Enter into the Vikings atmosphere as a real explorer. Our players have been traveling back in time to experience Fjord´s life.

4.title: Dethrone
4.description: Dethrone is a fantasy RPG adventure game where the player’s mission is to restore order in the region by completing missions given by the mysterious sovereign.

5.title: Mushroom Mania
5.description: Mushroom Mania is a collect-a-thon platformer set in an oversized fantasy mushroom world.

6.title: Tombs of Treasures
6.description: Tombs of Treasures is an action adventure/platformer walking simulator. In the game, the adventurer Liu Fogel arrives in the jungle to look for treasures.

7.title: Sweet village
7.description: This is Rex. Many legends were told by ancient yummy bears but nobody could say how Rex ended up in this candy world. Who knows, maybe he ate too much candy and ended up here.

8.title: 3D print your life
8.description: Have you ever tried a 3D printer? Based on the CNC concept (Computer Numerical Control) a 3D printer helps you to build solid objects. 3D printing has been around for several years but only in more recent years has it become more accessible to the general public.

discover.title: Discover The Sandbox
discover.description: The Sandbox is a virtual Metaverse where players can play, build, own, and monetize their virtual experiences. We empower artists, creators, and players to build the platform they’ve always envisioned, providing them with the means to unleash their creativity.

nft.title: NFTs
nft.description: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are virtual tokens minted on the blockchain for digital scarcity, security, and authenticity. They are unique, indivisible, and non-interchangeable — allowing true digital ownership of in-game assets.

land.title: CREATE ON YOUR OWN LAND
land.description: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are virtual tokens minted on the blockchain for digital scarcity, security, and authenticity. They are unique, indivisible, and non-interchangeable — allowing true digital ownership of in-game assets.

about.title: About the Alpha Season 2
about.description1: Everyone with a TSB account!! Contrary to Alpha Season 1, all of the 37 Season 2 experiences will be opened to all, except one that will be gated to Alpha Pass owners. The dynamic of the Season will be very different, everybody can play, and everybody has a chance to win an Alpha Pass by playing!
about.text2: How long does the Alpha last?

howToJoin.title: Joining the Alpha Season 2 (Raffle)
howToJoin.text1: How can I get an Alpha Pass?

bulletPoints.description1: at the end of the Alpha Season 2: the more you play and the more you invest yourself in The Sandbox ecosystem, the more chances you have to win. S2AP will be distributed to the Raffle winners on Mar. 31, 2022.
bulletPoints.description2: Weekly distribution to the daily Social Contests winners.
bulletPoints.description3: You can buy a S2AP on the secondary market if someone is willing to sell theirs.
bulletPoints.warning: Be careful when purchasing a S2AP on the secondary market as there may be fakes and there is no point in purchasing one after Season 2 has ended on March 31, 2022 at 4 PM UTC.

howToJoin.text2: How do I register for the raffle?
howToJoin.description2: The Raffle will occur at the end of the Alpha Season 2 on March 31, 2022. Contrary to Season 1, there is no Raffle before the Season starts. To register for the Season 2 Raffle, you simply have to play the game. By completing quests in the game (which everybody can do for free) you will earn Raffle Tickets by leveling up. As soon as you reach level 1 (which is very fast, you only need to complete a few quests) you will become eligible for the Raffle.
howToJoin.text3: What is the maximum number of Raffle tickets that I can get?
howToJoin.description4: Yes. You get 40 Raffle Tickets for each LAND you have in your wallet by the end of the Alpha Season 2 when the Raffle starts. Caped to a maximum of 200 Raffle Tickets (5 LANDs). This is going to significantly increase your chances but does not guarantee you to win.
howToJoin.text4: Do I have more chances to win an Alpha Pass if I’m a LAND owner?
howToJoin.description5: Yes. You get 130 extra Raffle Tickets if you have a Season 1 Alpha Pass in your wallet by the end of the Alpha Season 2 when the Raffle starts. This is not cumulative, only one S1AP per wallet will count for extra Raffle Tickets.
howToJoin.text0: What is the point of the Alpha Pass if everything is open to everyone?
howToJoin.description0: The $SAND rewards! Only Alpha Pass owners can claim the S2 Alpha Rewards at the end of the Alpha Season 2. Rewards can go up to 1,000 $SAND per S2 Alpha Pass.
howToJoin.description1: There are 3 ways of winning a S2 Alpha Pass:
howToJoin.description3a: Please check the tab “Raffle Tickets” for more details.
howToJoin.description3b: In total, you can earn up to 1100 Raffle Tickets if you max out every source.
howToJoin.text5: Do I have more chances to win a Season 2 Alpha Pass if I own a Season 1 Alpha Pass?
howToJoin.text6: Do I have more chances to win a Season 2 Alpha Pass if I participated in Alpha Season 1 but did not keep my Season 1 Alpha Pass?
howToJoin.description6: No. You need to own a Season 1 Alpha Pass to get the associated extra Raffle Tickets.
howToJoin.text7: Can I win more than 1 Season 2 Alpha Pass in the Raffle if I own many LANDS and many Season 1 Alpha Passes?
howToJoin.description7: No. One Season 2 Alpha Pass per wallet only. If you get a Season 2 Alpha Pass by participating in Social Contests, you will not be able to get another one from the Raffle.
howToJoin.text8: Is there a moment where there is no point anymore to get a Season 2 Alpha Pass?
howToJoin.description8a: Yes. Do not purchase a S2AP on the secondary market after Season 2 has ended, on March 31, 2022 16 UTC, as you will not be able to claim the $SAND rewards with it anymore if you purchase it after this date.
howToJoin.description8b: But, you can safely purchase a S2AP on OpenSea while Alpha Season 2 is ongoing, as long as you own it before March 31, 2022 16 UTC.

playing.title: Playing the Alpha Season 2
playing.text1: What do I need to play the Alpha Season 2?
playing.description1: - You need to play on Windows (other computer OS and mobile versions will come in the future).
playing.description2: - You also need a permanent internet connection.
playing.description3: - To claim your Alpha Pass and rewards, you’ll need a little ETH to pay the gas fees.

requirements.title: The Sandbox Alpha Game Client Minimum Specs
requirements.3: i5-8400 or newer (AVX support is required)

playing.text2: How do I play the Alpha?
playing.description4: Up to 40 players can be in one experience at the same time. When more than 40 players try to enter the same experience, a new instance of that experience is created. This means that when you are in a multiplayer experience you will only see up to 39 other players, but there could be more players in other instances.
playing.hrefText1: Click here to download the Game Client.
playing.text3: Can I play the Alpha Season 2 on the Game Maker?
playing.description5: Content will be released progressively with 1 to 3 experiences released every weekday during the 4 weeks of Season 2.
playing.description6: If you click on the Experience thumbnails on the Alpha Map, you’ll see the date and time it will be revealed. In the top right corner of the Alpha Map, you will also find a calendar showing when new Experiences will be released in the future.
playing.text4: How many people can get in one Experience at the same time?
playing.description7: Yes, you can access the Alpha HUB and 3 more experiences: The “NFT Institute” art gallery, the “Club XYZ” dance club, and The “Dungeon of Dum-Yz” adventure.
playing.description8: Yes. This is a very important thing to understand, contrary to Season 1, you don’t need the Alpha Pass to progress. Everybody can play and everybody can earn Raffle Tickets to win a Season 2 Alpha Pass during the Raffle at the end of Season 2.
playing.text6: How do I know when an Experience will be revealed?
playing.description9: While you have your Season 2 Alpha Pass, the website interface will tell you that, since you already have an Alpha Pass you are no longer eligible to win one during the Raffle at the end of Alpha Season 2, thus you will see that you don’t have any Raffle Tickets - but if you sell / giveaway / lose your Alpha Pass, we tracked your progression in the background so you won’t have to redo the quests you already completed.
playing.text7: Can I play along with a friend?
playing.description10: No, you cannot keep playing after the closing date. On March 31 all experiences of the Alpha Season 2 will be closed, except for one gated experience that will remain open for S2AP owners only for 24 extra hours (more info below).
playing.description11: After the Raffle, once the lucky people who won a Season 2 Alpha Pass have been picked, we will open the last experience of the Alpha Season 2 for 24 hours only. That experience will be accessible only to Season 2 Alpha Pass owners at that time. This will be the Season 2 VIP party!
playing.description12: Players can play your games inside the Game Maker Gallery. However, you can’t publish your games on your LAND yet. We are working to enable publishing on your LAND in the near future. Get a chance to put your games in one of our upcoming seasons by participating in our Alpha Game Jams.
playing.description14: All players reaching level 5 will get the season's Memorabilia (not an NFT), which will grant them extra rewards for all future seasons. We will communicate more details about that soon.
playing.description15: Just be patient. There is a possibility of high latency on blockchain between purchasing an avatar (Doggy) and that avatar showing up in Avatar Creator.
playing.description21: in the in-game chat to see the chat commands.
playing.text8: Can I Earn progression by completing quests without a Season 2 Alpha Pass?
playing.description22: No, once the Alpha closes all experiences will be unavailable until further notice.
playing.text9: If I get an Alpha Pass, do quests, then lose my Alpha Pass, will my progression be retroactively tracked or do I need to redo all the quests I did?
playing.description23: Yes, players can use the Game Maker Gallery to play the games you created. However, you can’t publish your game into your LAND yet. We are working to enable publishing in your LAND in the near future.
playing.text10: Can I keep playing the Alpha Season 2 after it ends on March 31, 2022?

rewards.title: Alpha Season 2 Rewards
rewards.description1: No. You can see Raffle Tickets as an indicator of a player’s investment in the Alpha Season 2, but they are not NFTs and cannot be traded on the secondary market.
rewards.description2: You will receive an email if you won, and you will get a popup on the website informing you if you won the Raffle or not on the Raffle day.
rewards.text2: How will I know if I won the Raffle?
rewards.description3: No. The Season 2 Alpha Pass is the key that allows you to claim the $SAND rewards. However, please remember not to purchase the S2AP after the Season 2 has closed on March 31, 2022, at 4 PM UTC.
rewards.text3: Is there a way to earn the $SAND rewards if I don’t have the Season 2 Alpha Pass?
rewards.description4: No. Only one S2AP per wallet.
rewards.text4: Can I get multiple Season 2 Alpha Passes?
rewards.description5: Yes. You can own one Alpha Pass of each Season in your wallet.
rewards.text5: Can I get a Season 2 Alpha Pass if I already have a Season 1 Alpha Pass?
rewards.description6: To earn the 1,000 $SAND reward you will need to play-to-earn by completing all 5 levels of the Alpha Pass by completing Alpha Quests in the game. Alpha Quests are very simple quests that only require you to explore the Alpha experiences. Check the Reward Tab section to learn more about the Alpha Quests and the rewards.
rewards.text6: Do I get the 1,000 $SAND reward just for playing the Alpha Season 2?
rewards.description7: No. You need the Season 2 Alpha Pass to trigger the rewards claim, so hold on to it if you want your $SAND rewards!
rewards.description8: 24 hours. During that time Season 2 Alpha Pass winners will be able to hang out in a gated VIP experience that only they can access.
rewards.description9: You can claim the $SAND rewards only at the end of the Alpha Season 2 (March 31, 2022), if you own a Season 2 Alpha Pass.
rewards.description10: You won’t be able to claim rewards. However, if you reach level 2, lose your Pass but then either get it back or another Pass back, you will be back to level 2, your progression will be saved.
rewards.text7: If I gift/sell my Season 2 Alpha Pass, can I still get the $SAND rewards for the levels I completed?
rewards.description11: Claim of the Season 2 Alpha Pass NFT and the $SAND rewards will still be on layer 1.
rewards.text8: How long between the Raffle and the Reward Claim?
rewards.description12: It depends on how you got your Alpha Pass.
rewards.description13: There is no time limit to claim your $SAND rewards.
rewards.description14: But remember! Only one person will be able to claim the rewards since only one person will have the Pass in their wallet when the Alpha ends! You can trade your pass with a friend to allow them to explore the game and have fun, but you need to get it back for the rewards!!
rewards.text9: When can I claim the $SAND rewards? Can I claim them as I progress through each level?
rewards.description15: Alpha Pass holders need to hold onto their Alpha Pass until the last day of the Alpha to claim rewards. What matters is the date (last day of the Alpha on December 20), not the progression on the Pass. The Alpha Pass holder must keep it until the last day, even if they completed all objectives prior to that date. Once the Alpha is over, an Alpha Pass has no value other than as memorabilia and can no longer be used to earn progression or rewards.
rewards.description16: Do not purchase an Alpha Pass once the Alpha is over (after December 20) if you hope to get progression and rewards. Only buy one after December 20 if you want it as a souvenir that has no other purpose.
rewards.description6a: First, the rewards might go up to 1,000 $SAND but it’s not guaranteed, please see the section below about Reward Community Booster. Rewards will be AT LEAST 500 $SAND for completing the 5 levels of Season 2.
rewards.description6b: Second, playing the Alpha gives you a chance to win a Season 2 Alpha Pass. If you win, the rewards are yours!
rewards.text10: Alpha passes can be traded. What happens if I make it to Level 2 and then trade my pass?
rewards.text11: On which chain will the Season 2 Alpha Pass and $SAND rewards be claimed?
rewards.text12: How much time do I have to claim my Season 2 Alpha Pass?

bulletPoints.description1: 1. If you won your S2AP through a Social Contest, while Alpha Season 2 was ongoing, you must claim it before March 31, 2022.
bulletPoints.description2: 2. If you won your S2AP through the Raffle at the end of Alpha Season 2, there is no deadline to claim it.

level.title: Progression
level.text1: How do I progress in the Alpha? How can I reach level 5?
level.description1: You need to complete Alpha Quests to progress in the Alpha. Enter any experience other than the Alpha Hub and locate the Metaverse Guide. Talk to him to get an Alpha Quest. You can easily spot him thanks to the blue exclamation mark above his head.
level.description2: To complete level 5, you will need to complete enough Alpha Quests in the game. But don’t worry — they are very easy and only require you to explore locations in the experience.
level.text2: Do I need to perform a daily action repeatedly?
level.description3: There are no requirements for daily activity. If you want to, you can complete all objectives in one sitting.

presscoverage.title: Press Coverage
presscoverage.text1: How does the press access the Alpha Season 2?
presscoverage.description1: Contrary to Alpha Season 1, Press won’t have to request whitelisting access to discover the game, as everybody will be able to play and access 100% of the content.
presscoverage.text2: How can I request access to the Alpha for press coverage?
presscoverage.description2: To request your Influencer Pass, please contact us at: contact@sandbox.game. Please make sure to include your communication channels and an overview of your audience, outreach, and objectives to access to the Alpha.

security.title: Security
security.text1: How can I keep my wallet safe?
security.description1: There are a lot of bad actors waiting for an opportunity to get your tokens and NFTs. You need to be really careful! We suggest that you always keep in mind the following recommendations:

bulletPoints.0: Never share your seed phrase with anyone
bulletPoints.1: Don’t keep your seed phrase unprotected
bulletPoints.2: Create strong passwords for your wallet & any accounts associated with it
bulletPoints.3: Use a password manager with a very strong master password
bulletPoints.4: Do not, under any circumstances, leave your wallet unlocked in the browser
bulletPoints.5: Encrypt your PC drive and use strong passwords for it and your user account
bulletPoints.6: Avoid using public Wi-Fi, and if it cannot be helped, use a VPN to protect yourself
bulletPoints.7: Do not click links from any unknown email, Discord, chat, or other source

security.description5: - Basic Safety and Security Tips for Metamask
security.description6: - To be your Own Bank with MetaMask, you need to master these best practices
security.text2: Will The Sandbox ever request my secret seedphrase (aka passphrase)?
security.description7: NO, The Sandbox will never request your secret passphrase and you should not share your secret passphrase with anyone! Sharing your secret passphrase will compromise your wallet and you might lose all your tokens and NFTs.
security.text3: How can I report suspicious activity?
security.description8: If you detect any suspicious activity on social media, email or OpenSea, you can report it on our
security.description9: via the #reporting-scams channel. You can also reach us by email at contact@sandbox.game
security.text4: How do I know which assets are safe to buy at OpenSea?
security.description10: When looking for Alpha Passes, Assets, or LANDs at OpenSea, make sure it belongs to our verified Sandbox collection at
security.text5: What are the official links so I make sure I don’t get scammed?
security.description7a: NO NO NO, The Sandbox will never request your secret seedphrase and you should not share your secret seedphrase with anyone, ever! Sharing your secret seedphrase will compromise your wallet and you might lose all your tokens and NFTs.
security.description7b: Scammers are VERY creative and will go as far as steal TSB employee’s identities to try to get you to give away information! NEVER. GIVE. AWAY. YOUR. SEED. PHRASE. TO. ANYONE.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.text1: Will there be more Seasons like the Alpha? When?
roadmap.description1: Yes, there will be more seasons after the Alpha ends. The date of the next season is yet to be defined.

staking.title: Staking & Community Reward Booster
staking.description1a: To make things overly simple: Staking (in the context of TSB Alpha Season 2) means that you “lock” some of your cryptocurrency, which will in return earn you a yield over time. You can stop your staking and recover your funds at any time, but you will stop earning the yield. The more you stake for the longer time, the bigger the yield you will get.
staking.description1b: You’ll find a lot more details here:
staking.description1d: For people who are not familiar with staking, and will read the questions below, it’s very important to understand that you do not
staking.description1f: $SAND to earn bonuses related to Alpha Season 2, you get bonuses from staking SAND, which can already be a very profitable feature in itself.
staking.text2: In summary, how does the Staking feature relates to Season 2?
staking.description2b: staking SAND will grant you extra Raffle Tickets.
staking.description2d: a booster will be applied to all S2AP $SAND rewards based on the total amount of SAND staked by the whole community.
staking.text3: In detail, how does the Staking feature relates to Season 2?
staking.description3a: This feature is a bit complex, but you do not have to understand how it works under the hood to make optimal use of it, however, you can find the details below:
staking.description3c: The more and the longer you stake SAND, the more your “staking score” increases. The bigger the staking score you have, the more Raffle Tickets you will get.
staking.description3d: To get the maximum number of Raffle Tickets from the staking feature (200) you need to have accumulated at least
staking.description3f: The bigger everyone’s staking score is, the more the Community Reward Booster increases. The more the Community Reward Booster increases, the more the Season 2 Alpha Pass $SAND reward is increased for all. The Community Reward Booster is capped at a maximum of +100%. To reach this cap, the community staking score has to reach the target of
staking.description3h: - The S2AP base reward is 500 $SAND. If by the end of Alpha Season 2, the community staking score reached
staking.description3i: - If by the end of Alpha Season 2, the community staking score reached
staking.text4: Will I still get the same yield for staking $SAND during Alpha Season 2?
staking.description4: Yes, the staking features related to Alpha Season 2 act as a bonus and will not impact the yield in any way. Your SAND will not be locked for longer. Nothing changes with the staking feature itself. The “caps” related to Alpha Season 2 features have no impact on the yield at all.
staking.text5: On which chain does the Community Reward Booster work?
staking.description5: On Layer 2, but only on the SAND staking program (not on the SAND/MATIC program). The whole point of the feature is to incentivize SAND staking on layer 2 to continue our transition to layer 2, which will be a great improvement to the game by reducing gas fees and making TSB a lot greener!
staking.text6: How is the staking score calculated?
staking.description6a: Again, you do not need to understand the math to make optimal use of this feature, but if you are curious, this is how it works:
staking.description6c: This number is a float, you will get exactly the amount of staking score points related to your staking contribution.
staking.description6e: It is important to understand that both time and SAND staked amount are taken into account to calculate the staking score.
staking.description6j: The total amount of staking score point for the community is just the sum of each user's staking score.
staking.description6k: Please note that the amount of days that SAND is staked does not have to be consecutive.
staking.text7: Should I wait for Alpha Season 2 to begin to start staking SAND?
staking.description7a: You can start staking right now, you don’t have to wait. If you want to stake now, you definitely should. Might as well get your yield growing as soon as possible!
staking.description7b: You will start to earn staking score points related to Alpha Season 2 features once the Alpha Season 2 starts, but we will simply look at how much you have previously staked at that moment and start calculating your score.
staking.description7c: You do not need to wait for Alpha Season 2 to begin to start staking, and you do not need to withdraw and stake back your funds once Alpha Season 2 has started to optimize your staking score.
staking.description7d: You, and the community, will not start earning staking score points until the Alpha Season 2 has started. The staking score points objectives, both individual
staking.text8: You are only talking about SAND staking, what about the TSB SAND/MATIC staking program?
staking.description8: Alpha Season 2 features are only linked to the SAND staking pool. Staking on the SAND/MATIC program does not offer any bonus related to Alpha Season 2. This program will still work the same and produce the same yield, we do not abandon it, it’s just not related to the Alpha Season 2.
staking.text9: Can I lose staking score points?
staking.description9: No, this number can not go down. Points earned are earned for you and added to the Community Booster cumulative score. If you withdraw your stake, you will stop earning staking points, but you won’t lose what you have earned.
staking.text10: The Alpha already started multiple weeks ago, is there still a point for me to start staking now, am I too late?
staking.description10: You are never too late. The later you stake, the more SAND you will have to stake if you want to max out the number of Raffle Tickets that can be earned through staking (200). Even if you don’t stake that much and Alpha Season 2 will end soon, you can still get some Raffle Tickets for staking. It’s not because you don’t have the time and/or resources to hit the 200 Raffle Tickets cap that there is no point to try to get some. Also, staking can be a very profitable feature in itself, even when unrelated to Alpha Season 2 bonuses
staking.description3d1: staking score points by the end of the Alpha Season 2.
staking.description3h1: points or more, the Community Reward Booster will reach +100%. Therefore, the S2AP reward will be increased by +100% and reach 1,000 $SAND for all S2AP owners.
staking.description3i1: points, the Community Reward Booster will reach +57%. Therefore, the S2AP reward will be increased by +57% and reach 785 $SAND (500 + 57% of 500) for all S2AP owners.
staking.description6b1: staking score points for every 1 SAND staked during 28 days.
staking.description6g1: staking score points (to get 200 Raffle Tickets). For every 1 SAND staked for the whole duration of the Alpha (28 days) you get
staking.description6g4: staking score point by staking 1 SAND over 14 days
staking.description6g5: staking score point by staking 2 SAND over 28 days
staking.description6g6: staking score point by staking 4 SAND over 7 days
staking.description6i2: collective cumulated staking score points (to get the Community Reward Booster to +100%).
staking.description7d2: have to be met in between the start and the end of the Alpha Season 2.

progression.title: Progression
progression.text1: How do I progress in the Alpha? How can I reach level 5?
progression.description1a: You need to complete Alpha Quests to progress in the Alpha. Enter any experience other than the Alpha Hub and locate the Metaverse Guide. Talk to him to get an Alpha Quest. You can easily spot him thanks to the blue exclamation mark above his head.
progression.description1b: Most quests are indicated by a yellow exclamation mark above the head of the NPC that will trigger the quest.
progression.description1c: Some quests are part of Quests Chains and will automatically be triggered when you complete other quests.
progression.description1d: Look for yellow exclamation marks and talk to NPCs (even if they don’t have Quests to give you they might steer you in the direction of an NPC who does!).
progression.text2: Do I need to perform a daily action repeatedly?
progression.description2: No. New experiences (hence new quests) are released every weekday, so eager players will play every day but if you want you can come late and do a lot of quests at once! Be careful though, there are a lot of quests and a lot of content! Some people will accumulate a lot of Raffle Tickets by completing a lot of quests. If you want to have good chances to win the Season 2 Alpha Pass by the end of the Alpha Season 2, you better not start working on quests too late or you won’t have time to complete much.

7.avatarDesc: Try to win a NFT avatar by participating to the Avatar Giveaway Events.
7.dailyDesc: Get extra Raffle Tickets to increase your chances of winning the Raffle. Each event will last for only one day. Don't miss it!
7.referralDesc: Refer friends to The Sandbox metaverse to earn extra Raffle Tickets.

8.title: Community Booster
8.description: The total amount of SAND staked by the community during Alpha Season 3 will boost the SAND rewards of all Season 3 Alpha Passes.

9.title: Ambassadors
9.description: 150+ ambassadors will be present in the metaverse to:
9.engageDesc: Greet players and invite them to participate in activities.
9.helpDesc: Guide players through the experiences and answer their questions.
9.moderateDesc: Ensure safety for everyone by moderating the chat.

10.title: Types of Experiences
10.sandboxDesc: Official TSB experiences, created by The Sandbox team.
10.partnersDesc: Created by our Partners. They have the ownership and responsibility for their content.
10.gmfDesc: Experiences made by the GMF creators, funded and supported by TSB.
10.gameJamDesc: The best experiences made by the community for the TSB Alpha Game Jam.
10.ugcDesc: Created by regular TSB users. They have the ownership and responsibility for their content. You might find a few bugs.

11.title: Identity Verification, KYC
11.description: Account verification will be required in order to claim Alpha Season 3 rewards and to participate in the Raffle and leaderboard.
11.description1: Go to your Profile, inside Setting you will be able to access to Identity Verification
11.description2: Position your face in the circe and follow the instructions so we can authenticate you.
11.description3: You will need to choose the type of documents and add the front and back of it.
11.description4: If all data is correct your status will change from "Pending Review" to "Verified".

about.title: About the Alpha Season 3
about.titleKey: Who can access the Alpha Season 3?
about.descriptionKey: Everyone with a TSB account! Just like Alpha Season 2, all of the Season 3 experiences will be open to all. Everybody can play, and everybody has a chance to win an Alpha Pass and SAND by playing!
about.titleKey1: How long does the Alpha last?

raffle.title: Joining the Alpha Season 3 (Raffle)
raffle.titleKey: What is the point of the Alpha Pass if everything is open to everyone?
raffle.descriptionKey:
The SAND rewards! Only Alpha Pass owners can claim the AS3 Alpha Rewards at the end of the Alpha Season 3. Rewards can be as much as 500 SAND per S3 Alpha Pass.

BUT, there are also rewards not linked to the Alpha Pass for LAND owners, Avatar owners, and NFT collectors – more information below!
raffle.titleKey1: How can I get an Alpha Pass?
raffle.descriptionKey1:
There are 3 ways of winning a S3 Alpha Pass:

 -  The Raffle: The more you play and the more you invest yourself in The Sandbox ecosystem through the end of Alpha Season 3, the more chances you have to win an Alpha Pass.
 -  Weekly Alpha Giveaway: Participate in Twitter contests once a week to get a chance to win an Alpha Pass.
 -  OpenSea: You can buy a S3AP on the secondary market if someone is willing to sell theirs. {0}
raffle.descriptionKey1-1: Be careful when purchasing a S3AP on the secondary market as there may be fakes and there is no point in purchasing one after Alpha Season 3 has ended!
raffle.titleKey2: How do I register for the Raffle?
raffle.descriptionKey2: The Raffle will occur at the end of the Alpha Season 3. To register for the Season 3 Raffle, you simply have to play experiences. By completing quests in the game (which everybody can do for free) you will earn EPs (Ethos Points) and Raffle Tickets by leveling up. As soon as you reach level 1 (which is very fast; you only need to complete a few quests) and your account has been validated by the identity verification, you will become eligible for the Raffle.
raffle.titleKey3: What is the maximum number of Raffle tickets that I can get?
raffle.descriptionKey3:
In total, you can earn up to 2,500 Raffle Tickets if you max out every source.

Here is the complete detail:
- Ethos Points (by completing quests): up to 500 Raffle Tickets (after earning 300 EPs)
- Staking: up to 500 Raffle Tickets
- Season 1 Alpha Pass Owner: 210 Raffle Tickets
- Season 2 Alpha Pass Owner: 210 Raffle Tickets
- Season 1 Memorabilia: 150 Raffle Tickets
- Season 2 Memorabilia: 150 Raffle Tickets
- Belonging Week Memorabilia: 150 Raffle Tickets
- Completing S2 feedback form: 30 Raffle Tickets
- Daily events: up to 350 Raffle Tickets
- Friend referral: up to 250 Raffle Tickets
raffle.titleKey4: Do I have more chances to win an Alpha Pass if I’m a LAND owner?
raffle.descriptionKey4: No. But there is a guaranteed (not linked to any random chance) reward for being a LAND owner if you play in Season 3. More information below.
raffle.titleKey5: Do I have more chances to win a Season 3 Alpha Pass if I own a Season 1 Alpha Pass or a Season 2 Alpha Pass?
raffle.descriptionKey5: Yes. You get 210 extra Raffle Tickets for each Alpha Pass from past Seasons in your wallet by the end of the Alpha Season 3 when the Raffle starts. You cannot cumulate Alpha Pass of the same season for Raffle Tickets but you can have up to 420 Raffle Tickets if you own a Season 1 Alpha Pass and a Season 2 Alpha Pass.
raffle.titleKey6: Can I win more than 1 Season 3 Alpha Pass?
raffle.descriptionKey6: No. One Season 3 Alpha Pass per wallet only. For example, if you get a Season 3 Alpha Pass by participating in Social Contests, you will not be able to get another one from the Raffle.
raffle.titleKey7: Is there a moment where there is no point anymore to get a Season 3 Alpha Pass?
raffle.descriptionKey7: Yes. Do not purchase a S3AP on the secondary market after Season 3 has ended as you will no longer be able to claim the SAND rewards with it if you purchase it after this date. But, you can safely purchase a S3AP on OpenSea while Alpha Season 3 is ongoing.

earning.title: Earning in the Alpha Season 3
earning.titleKey: Are there other ways than the Alpha Pass to earn rewards for Alpha Season 3?
earning.descriptionKey: Yes, for this season, we added two new sources of earning: the Owner Guaranteed Rewards and the Leaderboard. More information below.
earning.titleKey1: How can I be eligible for the Guaranteed Rewards?
earning.descriptionKey1:
There are 3 different types of Guaranteed Rewards for 3 different ownerships:
 - LAND Owners
 - NFT Avatar Owners
 - NFT Collector Badge
 If you own one or more of these at the end of the season, you will receive a reward based on the level you reached during the Alpha.
earning.titleKey2: Do any Avatars or NFTs count?
earning.descriptionKey2: Only NFTs released as part of Season 3 Collections will unlock the Avatar Owner and NFT Collector Badge reward. You can see which NFTs are included in the “NFT Shop” tab in the Alpha section of the website.
earning.titleKey3: How can I earn the NFT Collector Badge?
earning.descriptionKey3:
You need to collect 1 NFT from the Season 3 Collections to unlock the badge and earn the guaranteed owner reward.
Any NFT from the Season 3 Collections will work but other NFTs are not eligible for the badge. You can see which NFTs are included in the “NFT Shop” tab in the Alpha section of the website.
earning.descriptionKey4: The Leaderboard is a new feature in the Alpha Season 3 where you can compete with other players to win rewards based on your rank.
earning.titleKey5: How can I win on the Leaderboard?
earning.descriptionKey5: The Leaderboard is scored on EPs (Ethos Points) first, with a completion time tiebreaker. EPs are earned by completing Quests. Repeat Quests to improve your completion time, which will improve your ranking on the Leaderboard against players with the same number of EPs as you.
earning.titleKey6: I went up in the Leaderboard while not doing anything, why?
earning.descriptionKey6:
You might see yourself go up in the leaderboard if some users who are ranking above you fall into the following categories and are removed from the Leaderboard:
 - A cheater who got caught and banned
 - A user who did not complete KYC (Know Your Customer) before the end of the season (more information about KYC below)

playing.title: Playing the Alpha Season 3
playing.titleKey: What do I need to play the Alpha Season 3?
playing.descriptionKey:
- You need to play on Windows or Mac OS

 - Minimum configuration PC:
 OS: Windows 10 64bit
 GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or newer
 CPU: i5-8400 or newer (AVX support is required)
 RAM: 8192MB or more

 - Minimum configuration Mac:
 OS: MAC OS 10.13 or newer
 GPU: HD4000 equivalent or newer
 CPU: 3.1GHz dual-core Intel Core i5 or newer
 RAM: 8192MB or more

 - You also need a stable internet connection. 
 - You will also need a bit of ETH to pay for the gas fees if you want to claim an Alpha Pass.
playing.titleKey1: How do I play the Alpha Season 3?
playing.descriptionKey1: You will need to download the latest version of the Game Client that will be released alongside the Alpha Season 3. Click {0} to download the Game Client. Everybody with the right configuration can play and it’s free.
playing.titleKey2: Can I play the Alpha Season 3 on the Game Maker?
playing.descriptionKey2: No, you will need to play on the Game Client. You will be able to download the Game Client at {0} when the Alpha Season 3 opens.
playing.titleKey3: How many people can get in one Experience at the same time?
playing.descriptionKey3: Up to 40 players can play in one experience at the same time. When more than 40 players try to enter the same experience, a new instance of that experience is created. This means that when you are in a multiplayer experience you will only see up to 39 other players, but there could be many more players in other instances of the same experience.
playing.descriptionKey4: Content will be released progressively with 1 to 2 experiences released every day during the 10 weeks of Season 3.
playing.titleKey5: How do I know when an Experience will be revealed?
playing.descriptionKey5: If you click on the Experience icon on the Alpha Map, you’ll see the date and time when it will be revealed. In the top right corner of the Alpha Map, you will also find a calendar showing when new Experiences will be released in the future.
playing.titleKey6: Can I play along with a friend?
playing.descriptionKey6:
An Experience can have up to 40 players at a time; if there are more than 40 players, new instances are created to host the additional players. If you join an Experience at the same time as your friend, you have a high chance to end up in the same instance. But if you don’t, you can join them by following these steps:

 To find your instance ID after you enter the game, type {0} in chat.
 Give your instance ID to your friend who wants to join your instance.
 To jump to your instance, your friend must type {1} in the chat. For example, {2} to join instance 2234.

 Type {3} in the in-game chat to see all chat commands
playing.titleKey7: Can I Earn progression by completing quests without a Season 3 Alpha Pass?
playing.descriptionKey7: Yes. This is a very important thing to understand – you don’t need the Alpha Pass to progress. Everybody can play and everybody can earn Raffle Tickets to win a Season 3 Alpha Pass during the Raffle at the end of Season 3.
playing.titleKey8: If I get an Alpha Pass, do quests, then lose my Alpha Pass, will my progression be retroactively tracked or do I need to redo all the quests I did?
playing.descriptionKey8: When you have your Season 3 Alpha Pass, the website interface will tell you that you are no longer eligible to win one during the Raffle at the end of Alpha Season 3. Thus, while you have a pass you will not show as having any Raffle Tickets. However, if you sell, give away, or lose your Alpha Pass, you won’t have to redo any of the quests you’ve already completed as we track your progression in the background and it will show up when the Alpha Pass is removed from your account.
playing.titleKey9: Can I keep playing Alpha Season 3 after it ends?
playing.descriptionKey9: No, you cannot keep playing after the closing date.
playing.titleKey10: Can players play the games I made?
playing.descriptionKey10: Players can play your games inside the Game Maker Gallery. However, you can’t publish your games on your LAND yet. We are working to enable publishing on your LAND in the near future. Get a chance to put your games in one of our upcoming seasons by participating in our Alpha Game Jams.
playing.descriptionKey11:
Chat commands are as follow:

 {0} – Whispers to the username a message.
 {1} – Send a message to the metaverse channel.
 {2} – Send a message to the land channel.
 {3} – Teleport to the spawn point.
 {4} – Show connected players list and count.
 {5} – Show a list of the available instances running this experience.
 {6} – Connects to the instance defined in instanceID.
 {7} – Transport to land on the north.
 {8} – Transport to land on the south.
 {9} – Transport to land on the east.
 {10} – Transport to land on the west.
 {11} – Trigger emotes: hi, hello, agree, yes, wave, disagree, no, happy, sad, bored, dance, hophop, and burnthefloor.
 {12} – Stop current emote.

rewards.title: Alpha Season 3 Rewards
rewards.descriptionKey: No. You can view Raffle Tickets as an indicator of a player’s investment in the Alpha Season 3, but they are not NFTs and cannot be traded on the secondary market.
rewards.titleKey1: How will I know if I won the Raffle?
rewards.descriptionKey1: You will receive an email if you won, and you will get a popup on the website informing you if you won or didn’t win the Raffle on the Raffle day.
rewards.titleKey2: Is there a way to earn the SAND rewards from the Raffle if I don’t have the Season 3 Alpha Pass?
rewards.descriptionKey2: No. The Season 3 Alpha Pass is the key that allows you to claim the SAND rewards.
rewards.titleKey3: Can I get a Season 3 Alpha Pass if I already have a Season 1 Alpha Pass or a Season 2 Alpha Pass?
rewards.descriptionKey3: Yes. You can own one Alpha Pass of each Season in your wallet.
rewards.titleKey4: Do I get the 500 SAND reward just for playing the Alpha Season 3?
rewards.descriptionKey4:
First, the rewards might go up to 500 SAND but it’s not guaranteed; please see the section below about the Reward Community Booster. Rewards will be AT LEAST 250 SAND for completing the 5 levels of Season 3.
 Second, playing the Alpha gives you a chance to win a Season 3 Alpha Pass through the Raffle.
 If you win, the rewards are yours!
rewards.titleKey5: If I gift/sell/lose my Season 3 Alpha Pass, can I still get the SAND rewards for the levels I completed?
rewards.descriptionKey5: No. You need the Season 3 Alpha Pass to trigger the Raffle rewards claim, so hold on to it if you want your SAND rewards!
rewards.titleKey6: How long between the Raffle and the Reward Claim?
rewards.titleKey7: When can I claim the SAND rewards? Can I claim them as I progress through each level?
rewards.descriptionKey7: You can claim the SAND rewards only at the end of the Alpha Season 3 if you own a Season 3 Alpha Pass.
rewards.titleKey8: Alpha passes can be traded. What happens if I make it to Level 2 and then trade my pass?
rewards.descriptionKey8: You won’t be able to claim rewards. However, if you reach level 2 and lose your Pass but then either get it back or another Pass back, you will be back to level 2 with your progression saved.
rewards.titleKey9: On which chain will the Season 3 Alpha Pass and SAND rewards be claimed?
rewards.descriptionKey9: Claiming of the Season 3 Alpha Pass NFT is on Ethereum Mainnet while the SAND is claimed on Polygon Mainnet. Don’t worry if you never used Polygon (layer 2) on your wallet; all the steps necessary to use this layer will be explained when you will claim your rewards.
rewards.titleKey10: How much time do I have to claim my Season 3 Alpha Pass?
rewards.descriptionKey10:
It depends on how you got your Alpha Pass.
 1. If you won your S3AP through a Social Contest, while Alpha Season 3 was ongoing, you must claim it BEFORE THE END of Alpha Season 3 or it will be lost!
 2. If you won your S3AP through the Raffle at the end of Alpha Season 3, there is no deadline to claim it.
rewards.titleKey11: How much time do I have to claim my SAND rewards?
rewards.descriptionKey11: There is no time limit to claim your SAND rewards.
rewards.titleKey12: Do I need to go through Know Your Customer (KYC) to claim rewards?
rewards.descriptionKey12: Yes! Know Your Customer is a standard requirement in the financial industry, and is used to verify customers and mitigate money laundering risks. We also use it to make sure users only play on one account. We are aware that it’s not always reassuring to share personal information but this is the only way to make sure the game is fair for everyone when it comes to rewards that translate to real money. Be absolutely sure that your data will NEVER be used for any other purpose than validating your account. The data is not even available to The Sandbox and its partners; it’s encrypted on our KYC provider database where even they cannot access or exploit the information.
rewards.titleKey13: I forgot to claim my SAND rewards from Alpha Season 1 or Alpha Season 2, can I still do that?
rewards.descriptionKey13: You can claim all unclaimed rewards related to previous Seasons (NFT rewards, SAND, Alpha Passes…) on this {0}

staking.title: Staking and Community Reward Booster
staking.descriptionKey:
To make things simple, staking (in the context of TSB Alpha Season 3) means that you “lock” some of your cryptocurrency to a pool, which will in return earn a yield for you over time. You can stop your staking and recover your funds at any time, but you will stop earning the yield. The more you stake for a longer time, the bigger the yield you will get.

 You’ll find a lot more details here:
 {0}

 For people who are not familiar with staking, and will read the questions below, it’s very important to understand that you do not {1} SAND to earn bonuses related to Alpha Season 3. Instead, you get bonuses from staking SAND, which can already be a very profitable feature in itself.
staking.titleKey1: In summary, how does the Staking feature relates to Season 3?
staking.descriptionKey1:
1. {0} staking SAND will grant you extra Raffle Tickets.
 2. {1} a booster will be applied to all S3AP SAND rewards based on the total amount of SAND staked by the whole community.
staking.titleKey2: In detail, how does the Staking feature relates to Season 3?
staking.descriptionKey2:
This feature is a bit complex, but you don’t have to understand how it works under the hood to make optimal use of it, However you can find the details below:

 1. {0} The more and the longer you stake SAND, the more your “staking score” increases. The bigger your staking score, the more Raffle Tickets you will get.
 To get the maximum number of Raffle Tickets from the staking feature (500) you need to have accumulated at least 500 staking score points by the end of the Alpha Season 3.

 2. {1} The bigger everyone’s staking score is, the more the Community Reward Booster increases. The more the Community Reward Booster increases, the more the Season 3 Alpha Pass SAND reward is increased for all.
 The Community Reward Booster is capped at a maximum of +100%. To reach this cap, the community staking score has to reach the target of 40,000,000 points.

 Examples: 
 - The S3AP base reward is 250 SAND. If by the end of Alpha Season 3, the community staking score reached 40,000,000 points or more, the Community Reward Booster will reach +100%. Therefore, the S3AP reward will be increased by +100% and reach 500 SAND for all S3AP owners.
 - If by the end of Alpha Season 3, the community staking score reached 24,800,000 points, the Community Reward Booster will reach +62%. Therefore, the S3AP reward will be increased by +62% and reach 405 SAND (250 + 62% of 250) for all S3AP owners.
staking.titleKey3: Will I still get the same yield for staking SAND during Alpha Season 3?
staking.descriptionKey3: Yes, the staking features related to Alpha Season 3 act as a bonus and will not impact the yield in any way. Your SAND will not be locked for longer. Nothing changes with the staking feature itself. The “caps” related to Alpha Season 3 features have no impact on the yield at all.
staking.titleKey4: On which chain does the Community Reward Booster work?
staking.descriptionKey4: The Community Reward Booster is on Layer 2 (Polygon), but only on the SAND staking program (not on the SAND/MATIC program). The whole point of the feature is to incentivize SAND staking on layer 2 to continue our transition to layer 2, which will be a great improvement to the game by reducing gas fees and making The Sandbox a lot greener!
staking.titleKey5: How is the staking score calculated?
staking.descriptionKey5:
Again, you do not need to understand the math to make optimal use of this feature, but if you are curious, this is how it works:
 {0}
 This number is a float; you will get exactly the amount of staking score points related to your staking contribution.

 {1}

 It is important to understand that both time and SAND staked amount are taken into account to calculate the staking score.

 1. {2} The cap is 500 staking score points (to get 500 Raffle Tickets). For every 1 SAND staked for the whole duration of the Alpha (70 days) you get 1 staking score point.
 It means that if you stake 500 SAND for 70 days you will earn the max amount of Raffle Tickets. You can also stake 1,000 SAND for 35 days, or 7,000 SAND for 10 days, for example.

 2. {3} The cap is 40,000,000 collective cumulated staking score points (to get the Community Reward Booster to +100%).
 The total amount of staking score points for the community is just the sum of each user's staking score.

 Please note that the amount of days that SAND is staked does not have to be consecutive.
staking.descriptionKey5-1: You get 1 staking score points for every 1 SAND staked during 70 days.
staking.titleKey6: Should I wait for Alpha Season 3 to begin to start staking SAND?
staking.descriptionKey6:
You can start staking right now, you don’t have to wait.
 If you want to stake now, you definitely should. Might as well get your yield growing as soon as possible!

 You will start to earn staking score points related to Alpha Season 3 features once the Alpha Season 3 starts, but we will simply look at how much you have previously staked at that moment and start calculating your score.
 You do not need to wait for Alpha Season 3 to begin to start staking, and you do not need to withdraw and stake back your funds once Alpha Season 3 has started to optimize your staking score.
 You, and the community, will not start earning staking score points until the Alpha Season 3 has started. The staking score points objectives, both individual (500) and collective (40,000,000), have to be met in between the start and the end of the Alpha Season 3.
staking.titleKey7: You are only talking about SAND staking, what about the TSB SAND/MATIC staking program?
staking.descriptionKey7: Alpha Season 3 features are only linked to the SAND staking pool. Staking on the SAND/MATIC program does not offer any bonus related to Alpha Season 3. This program will still work the same and produce the same yield. It’s still supported, it’s just not related to Alpha Season 3.
staking.titleKey8: Can I lose staking score points?
staking.descriptionKey8: No, this number cannot go down. Points earned are earned for you and added to the Community Booster cumulative score. If you withdraw your stake, you will stop earning staking points, but you won’t lose what you have earned.
staking.titleKey9: The Alpha already started multiple weeks ago; is there still a point for me to start staking now, am I too late?
staking.descriptionKey9: You are never too late. The later you stake, the more SAND you will have to stake if you want to max out the number of Raffle Tickets that can be earned through staking (500). Even if you don’t stake that much and Alpha Season 3 will end soon, you can still get some Raffle Tickets for staking, even if it’s not the full 500 possible tickets. Also, staking can be a very profitable feature in itself, aside from its Alpha Season 3 bonuses.

progression.title: Progression
progression.titleKey: How do I progress in the Alpha Season 3? How can I reach level 5?
progression.descriptionKey:
You need to enter Experiences in The Sandbox and complete quests to earn EPs and progress in the Alpha Season 3.
 Most quests are indicated by a yellow exclamation mark above the head of the NPC that will trigger the quest.
 Some quests are part of Quest Chains and will automatically be triggered when you complete other quests.
 Look for yellow exclamation marks and talk to NPCs (even if they don’t have Quests to give you they might steer you in the direction of an NPC who does!).
progression.titleKey1: Do I need to perform a daily action repeatedly?
progression.descriptionKey1: No. New experiences (hence new quests) are released everyday, so eager players will play every day but if you want you can come late and do a lot of quests at once! Be careful though, there are a lot of quests and a lot of content! Some people will accumulate a lot of Raffle Tickets by completing a lot of quests. If you want to have good chances to win the Season 3 Alpha Pass by the end of the Alpha Season 3, it’s better to not start working on quests too late or you won’t have time to complete much.

security.title: Security
security.titleKey: How can I keep my wallet safe?
security.descriptionKey:
There are a lot of bad actors waiting for an opportunity to get your tokens and NFTs. You need to be really careful! We suggest that you always keep in mind the following recommendations:

 - Never share your seed phrase with anyone
 - Don’t keep your seed phrase unprotected
 - Create strong passwords for your wallet and any accounts associated with it
 - Use a password manager with a very strong master password
 - Do not, under any circumstances, leave your wallet unlocked in the browser
 - Encrypt your PC drive and use strong passwords for it and your user account
 - Avoid using public Wi-Fi, and if it cannot be helped, use VPN to protect yourself
 - Do not click links from any unknown email, Discord, chat, or any other source
 - Stay alert!

 Read more about these suggestions here: {0}

 Additional security resources:

 - {1}
 - {2}
security.descriptionKey0-1: Basic Safety and Security Tips for Metamask
security.descriptionKey0-2: To Be Your Own Bank with MetaMask, You Need to Master These Password Best Practices
security.titleKey1: Will The Sandbox ever request my secret seedphrase (aka passphrase)?
security.descriptionKey1:
NO, NO, and NO. The Sandbox will never request your secret seedphrase and you should not share your secret seedphrase with anyone, ever! Sharing your secret seedphrase will compromise your wallet and you might lose all your tokens and NFTs.

 Scammers are VERY creative and will go as far as steal TSB employee’s identities to try to get you to give away information! NEVER. GIVE. AWAY. YOUR. SEED. PHRASE. TO. ANYONE.
security.titleKey2: How can I report suspicious activity?
security.descriptionKey2: If you detect any suspicious activity on social media, email, or OpenSea, you can report it on our Discord channel ({0}) via the #reporting-scams channel. You can also reach us out by email at contact@sandbox.game.
security.titleKey3: How do I know which assets are safe to buy on OpenSea?
security.descriptionKey3: When looking for Alpha Passes, Assets, or LANDs on OpenSea, make sure it belongs to our verified Sandbox collection at {0}.
security.titleKey4: What are the official links so I make sure I don’t get scammed?

14.title: Leaderboard anti-cheating measures
14.description: A security is in place to prevent cheating on the leaderboard:
bulletPoints: The Sandbox measured the fastest completion time for each quest.
We reduced that measurement because our players are more skilled than us! It gives us what is considered a “do-able” time.
If a player completes a quest faster than the “do-able” time we will consider the time invalid as it should mean that they are using cheats or completing quests in a non intended way.
On the leaderboard only EPs from quests completed in valid times are accounted for.
On the Reward tab all EPs count no matter if the time is valid or not.

reportModal.summaryThankyou: Thank you for reporting this asset
reportModal.summaryCommunityTexta: We will look into this report and remove this asset from our Marketplace if it does not comply with our

options.selfharm: Threats of harm or encouragement of self harm
options.crimes: Promotion or glorification of real life violence
options.othersrights: Infringes on the rights of another

reportTooltips.pornographicTooltip: Vulgar and sexually explicit, not necessarily nudity
reportTooltips.hatefulTooltip: Racism, sexism, ageism, and other hate directed towards groups either symbolically or literally
reportTooltips.harrasmentTooltip: Threatens individuals or targets them with malicious insults
reportTooltips.selfharmTooltip: Could promote acts that may result in physical harm
reportTooltips.crimesTooltip: Violence, crime, or terrorism (storytelling is fine, promoting real life terrorist groups or exhalating real life crimes/criminals is not)
reportTooltips.spamTooltip: Ad for another game as just an image, not an NPC that can be used in The Sandbox from that other game.
reportTooltips.scamsTooltip: Items used to defraud buyers - knock offs posing as official content
reportTooltips.myrightsTooltip: I believe this content is not authorized and the IP holder should be alerted
reportTooltips.othersrightsTooltip: Promotion of products and services outside of The Sandbox without any purpose in The Sandbox

create.title: Creating an Asset
create.text1: When a creator designs an asset, they have to distribute points amongst the chosen attributes.
create.text2: A creator can change the amount of attributes while creating an asset.
create.text3: When a Game Maker update is released, new mechanics can use existing attributes or new ones released with the update.

values.1: Attributes give bonuses within a game
values.2: Not having an attribute does not prevent from playing
values.3: Games display used attributes in their description

values.1: Game mechanics come with attribute presets
values.2: Assets need the required attributes to be used with a game mechanism
values.3: Creators can modify the attributes required by a game mechanic

create.text4: This system remains flexible both for creators (allows them to tweak their game at will) and for players (not restricting game access, but giving more or less bonuses).

header.title: VoxEdit - NFT Creator
header.description: The leading software that allows you to create, rig, and animate your own voxel-based NFTs. Sell them on The Sandbox's marketplace and discover a new world.

cards.1: In order to upload your models, you need to become an artist through our Creator Fund.
cards.2: VoxEdit is the only software capable of exporting assets to our Marketplace. Download VoxEdit and start creating.
cards.3: Once you’ve finished your model you can export it to the Marketplace following these simple steps.

1.title: Modeler
1.description: Make the most of your creativity! From beginners to experts, anyone can make amazing creations thanks to our robust set of tools and our user-friendly interface.

2.title: Animator
2.description: A game changer in the voxel creation world. With our Skeleton System, VoxEdit allows you to rig and animate anything that you want using the timeline via an easy-to-use keyframing mode.

3.title: NFT Maker
3.description: Sell, trade, and buy VoxEdit assets on The Sandbox's marketplace and monetize your creations. 95% of all transactions go to you, the creator!

0.text: VoxEdit has impressed me, since it's the fusion of a modeling editor with an animation system all in the same software.
0.author: William Santacruz

1.text: VoxEdit is a game changer for voxel artists looking to animate, being the only dedicated voxel editor that features skeletal rigging and timeline animation.
1.author: Alex Florez

2.text: One of the easiest tools to create animations in voxel art, with an attractive and a very simple easy-to-use interface for beginners.
2.author: Nicolas Morrone

play.title: Play by the Rules!
play.text1: The default size is 32x32x32, which translates to 1 meter (3.2 ft) in The Sandbox Universe.
play.text2: 32x32x32 is the maximum detail available to make inside a cubic meter. An avatar will be about 2 blocks in height (64 Voxels).
play.text3: VoxEdit comes with a lot of templates to help you get started with your creations, however, please take a look at our technical guidelines to make sure your assets will work in the best way in the Game maker.

funding.title: Introducing the $2 million Creator fund
funding.subtitle: WE WANT TO HELP YOU CREATE, SHARE AND SELL YOUR AMAZING VOXEL CREATIONS ON OUR PLATFORM

cards.1: First, you'll sign up so we can evaluate your work, as we want to encourage the best voxel ASSETS
cards.2: Get paid for each asset you make AND get 100% of profits from each of your sales!
cards.3: Overall goal for the fund is to generate 10,000 voxel ASSETS for the game
cards.4: In addition to the grant, you'll be able to sell your creations to players when The Sandbox launches

funding.text: The program is limited to the first 1,000 artists accepted, so sign up today for a chance to enjoy the benefits!

sandbox.title: What is "The Sandbox" (SAND)
sandbox.text1: The Sandbox is a virtual metaverse where players can build, own, and monetize their gaming experiences on the Ethereum blockchain using the platform’s utility token SAND. Players can create digital assets in the form of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), upload them to the marketplace, and integrate them into games with Game Maker.
sandbox.text2: A LAND is a digital piece of real estate in The Sandbox metaverse that players can buy to build experiences on. Once a player owns a piece of LAND, they will be able to populate it with games and ASSETS. Multiple LANDS can be combined to form an ESTATE.
sandbox.text3: A total of 166,464 LANDS will be available, contained in a map that will form The Sandbox metaverse.
sandbox.text4: GEMS and CATALYSTS define the tier, scarcity, and attributes of ASSETS. CATALYSTS add empty sockets to the NFTs that can be filled with GEMS. The higher the quality of the CATALYST, the more sockets your ASSET will have.
sandbox.text5: Users can monetize their time on the platform, by keeping 95% of the SAND revenue by:

1.title: Selling ASSETS
1.description: Users can create and sell ASSETS on the marketplace as NFTs.

2.title: Owning a LAND
2.description: Buying a LAND in one of the LAND sales. Players can then rent them or populate them with content to increase the LAND's value.

3.title: Building Games on the Game Maker
3.description: Build and monetize games using the Game Maker on the LANDS that are owned by players.

sandbox.text6: Through the use of ERC-1776, The Sandbox allows platform users to initiate transactions on the Ethereum blockchain while transaction gas fees are paid by the platform, optimizing overall user experience.
sandbox.text7: 50% of all SAND transactions collected from LAND sales, Premium NFT sales, transaction fees and subscription services goes to the Foundation
sandbox.text8: The Foundation supports the ecosystem of The Sandbox, contributing to the growth of awareness about NFTs, the Metaverse, and $SAND.
sandbox.text9: The Foundation is currently involved with

foundation.1: Managing the Game Makers Fund and Creators Fund, offering grants to incentivize high quality content and game production in The Sandbox.
foundation.2: Funding over 17 game projects, some of which have been unveiled to the public at
foundation.3: Distributing grants to 100 artists to produce NFTs, most of which can be seen at
foundation.4: Supporting local community managers to grow awareness around the globe about The Sandbox, NFTs and blockchain gaming via our Community Rewards and Ambassadors program
foundation.5: Sponsoring prizes for the various contests organized by The Sandbox team (VoxEdit Contests and Game Jams) to stimulate the creativity of users around the world and get them to engage with the tools of our platform.
foundation.6: Supporting play-to-earn tournaments and cross-gaming with activities that encourage the broader adoption of SAND.

There will only ever be 166,464 LANDS available, which can be used to host games, build multiplayer experiences, create housing, or offer social experiences to the community

section1.title: Build, own and control your gaming destiny

paragraphs.1: The Sandbox is your chance to create a piece of gaming history. Join our extraordinary metaverse; own and monetize everything you build.
paragraphs.2: Our platform is based on the Ethereum blockchain and uses SAND as its primary utility token. You can use it to buy LAND, create digital assets, and upload them to trade in the marketplace. Or use your assets to create gaming experiences in The Sandbox Game Maker. It’s easy to do, and you don’t need coding experience.
paragraphs.3: When other players buy your assets or play your games, you earn SAND in return. It’s a brilliant, decentralized economy that rewards your participation.
paragraphs.4: If building and monetizing content is not your thing, you can explore the vast virtual world and see how others have developed their LAND. It’s engaging, fun, and ever-changing as our growing community continues to add exciting new characters, landscapes, and games.

paragraphs.1: The Sandbox metaverse is split into 166,464 LANDS, creative sandbox areas owned by you, the players. You can create and monetize online games on your land or rent it to someone else to publish their own creation. Each piece of LAND has a pre-defined default terrain, but you can modify this as you build your own content.

section3.title: User-generated content economy
paragraphs: Three pillars of technology work together to support your user-generated content production (UGC). You own the copyrights of everything you create in The Sandbox, and that will always be provable beyond doubt thanks to the blockchain and smart contracts. The three integrated UGC products that you can access are:
list: Voxel editor to create, rig and animate voxel models fast
Marketplace to view or trade assets to use on your LAND
Game Maker to build, share and monetize your online games

section4.title: Join big-name gaming partners
paragraphs: The Sandbox has already forged more than 50 partnerships with leading brands to develop crypto game content, including Shaun the Sheep, ATARI, and Square Enix, to name but a few. You will see these partners on the game map (see the main menu), alongside thousands of individual users planning their own content. There is plenty of real estate for newcomers.

01.question: When does the migration start?
01.answer: The migration page will be deployed on January the 26th.

02.question: How to migrate?
02.answer2: and follow the instructions. You need to be logged in with your wallet and associated Sandbox account.

03.question: What does the migration do exactly?
03.answer: The migration page lists all LAND for a given LAND owner. Upon signing the transaction, the smart contract locks away LANDs from the old contract and mints the exact same LANDs on the new contract for the owner.

04.question: How much does it cost?
04.answer: Nothing. We have deployed a gasless solution to enable free transactions for our users.

05.question: How long does it take?
05.answer: Once the transaction is signed, it will take a couple minutes to go through the network.

06.question: Is there a time limit?
06.answer: Not at this moment. We want to give you space to migrate LANDs at your own pace.

07.question: How do I know which LAND I still have to migrate to the new contract ?
07.answer2: , you will see all LAND you own on their respective contracts.

08.question: How do I find my LAND after the migration?
08.answer: Your LAND will be minted in the same wallet and can be found in your The Sandbox inventory or any other wallet reader.

09.question: What if my LAND is in cold storage?
09.answer: You will need to proceed as you usually do when transferring your assets, move it to your selected wallet and migrate your LAND. Then you can move it back to cold storage.

10.question: What if my LAND is staked in a smart contract?
10.answer: You will need to withdraw your LAND from the smart contract and migrate it.

11.question: There was an error during the transaction, what do I do?
11.answer: We are normally handling all errors. If you encounter unexpected errors, please contact us through

12.question: The migration page says I have several transactions to sign, is it normal ?
12.answer: Yes, if you have a lot of LAND the contract might need to handle them in separate transactions due to gas limits. This is completely normal and all transaction costs will be covered by The Sandbox.

13.question: What is the migration contract address?

14.question: What is the new LAND contract address?

15.question: What if I purchased a LAND from the old contract after the migration started?
15.answer: You can migrate it, do not worry. It is not based on a snapshot but on real time ownership.

16.question: What if I have no ETH for the migration?
16.answer: The migration is gasless so you don’t need any ETH. We cover all costs.

playToEarn.content: Free-to-play is so 2010… With The Sandbox, you will be able to monetize the games you create! Play-to-Earn is unlocked through our rewarding model for players and creators, who will have strong incentives to play and create with rewards that have real-world value.

zero.title: Liquidity Mining
zero.paragraph1: The Sandbox is a virtual Metaverse where players can play, build, own, and monetize their virtual experiences. You can also invest your crypto currency and earn more SAND

first.title: DISCOVER THE SANDBOX
first.paragraph1: The Sandbox is a virtual Metaverse where players can play, build, own, and monetize their virtual experiences. We empower artists, creators, and players to build the platform they’ve always envisioned, providing them with the means to unleash their creativity.

second.title: BECOME A LAND OWNER
second.paragraph1: A LAND is a piece of The Sandbox metaverse, providing access to exclusive content as well as granting the possibility to monetize your own part of The Sandbox’s Metaverse. Build experiences, host events, invite friends.

third.title: WHY SAND?
third.paragraph1: $SAND is our main utility token that allows you to buy and sell LANDS and ASSETS in The Sandbox metaverse.

fourth.title: NFT
fourth.paragraph1: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are virtual tokens minted on the blockchain for digital scarcity, security, and authenticity. They are unique, indivisible, and non-interchangeable — allowing true digital ownership of in-game assets.

privacyPolicy.text88: Certain information is collected by most browsers or automatically through your device, such as your Media Access Control (MAC) address, computer type (Windows or Mac), screen resolution, operating system name and version, device manufacturer and model, language, Internet browser type and version and the name and version of the Services you are using.  We use this information to ensure that the Services function properly.
privacyPolicy.text90: Cookies are pieces of information stored directly on the computer that you are using.  Cookies allow us to collect information such as browser type, time spent on the Services, pages visited, language preferences, mouse clicks, page scrolls, keystrokes and other traffic data.  We and our service providers use the information for security purposes, to facilitate navigation, to display information more effectively, and to personalize your experience.  We also gather statistical information about use of the Services in order to continually improve their design and functionality, understand how they are used, and assist us with resolving questions regarding them. Cookies further allow us to select which of our advertisements or offers are most likely to appeal to you and display them while you are on the Services.  We may also use cookies or other technologies in online advertising to track responses to our ads.  We do not currently respond to browser do-not-track signals. If you do not want information collected through the use of cookies, most browsers allow you to automatically decline cookies or be given the choice of declining or accepting a particular cookie (or cookies) from a particular website.  You may also wish to refer to
privacyPolicy.text90part2: . If, however, you do not accept cookies, you may experience some inconvenience in your use of the Services.  You also may not receive advertising or other offers from us that are relevant to your interests and needs.

privacyPolicy.text92: Pixel tags (also known as web beacons and clear GIFs) may be used to, among other things, track the actions of users of the Services (including email recipients), measure the success of our marketing campaigns, and compile statistics about usage of the Services and response rates.

privacyPolicy.text94: Uses and Disclosures of Other Information
privacyPolicy.text95: We may use and disclose Other Information for any purpose, except where we are required to do otherwise under applicable law.  If we are required to treat Other Information as Personal Information under applicable law, we may use and disclose it for the purposes for which we use and disclose Personal Information as detailed in this Policy.  In some instances, we may combine Other Information with Personal Information.  If we do, we will treat the combined information as Personal Information as long as it is combined.
privacyPolicy.text97: We seek to use reasonable organizational, technical and administrative measures to protect Personal Information within our organization.  Unfortunately, no data transmission or storage system can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.  If you have reason to believe that your interaction with us is no longer secure, please immediately notify us in accordance with the “Contacting Us” section below.
privacyPolicy.text99: Your choices regarding our use and disclosure of your Personal Information
privacyPolicy.text100: We give you choices regarding our use and disclosure of your Personal Information for marketing purposes.  If you no longer want to receive marketing related emails from us on a going-forward basis, you may opt out by clicking the unsubscribe link in such email.
privacyPolicy.text101: We will try to comply with your request(s) as soon as reasonably practicable.  Please note that if you opt out of receiving marketing related emails from us, we may still send you important administrative messages, from which you cannot opt out.
privacyPolicy.text102: How you can access, change, or delete your Personal Information
privacyPolicy.text103: If you would like to request to access, correct, update, suppress, restrict, or delete Personal Information, object to or opt out of the processing of Personal Information, or if you would like to request to receive a copy of your Personal Information for purposes of transmitting it to another company (to the extent these rights are provided to you by applicable law), you may contact us in accordance with the “Contacting Us” section below.  We will respond to your request consistent with applicable law.  In your request, please make clear what Personal Information you would like to have changed or whether you would like to have your Personal Information suppressed from our database.  For your protection, we may only implement requests with respect to the Personal Information associated with the particular email address that you use to send us your request, and we may need to verify your identity before implementing your request.  We will try to comply with your request as soon as reasonably practicable.
privacyPolicy.text104: Please note that we may need to retain certain information for recordkeeping purposes and/or to complete any transactions that you began prior to requesting a change or deletion (e.g., when you make a purchase or enter a promotion, you may not be able to change or delete the Personal Information provided until after the completion of such purchase or promotion).
privacyPolicy.text106: We retain Personal Information for as long as needed or permitted in light of the purpose(s) for which it was obtained and consistent with applicable law.
privacyPolicy.text107: The criteria used to determine our retention periods include:
privacyPolicy.text108: The length of time we have an ongoing relationship with you and provide the Services to you (for example, for as long as you have an account with us or keep using the Services);
privacyPolicy.text109: Whether there is a legal obligation to which we are subject (for example, certain laws require us to keep records of your transactions for a certain period of time before we can delete them); or
privacyPolicy.text110: Whether retention is advisable in light of our legal position (such as in regard to applicable statutes of limitations, litigation or regulatory investigations).
privacyPolicy.text112: The Services are not directed to individuals under the age of eighteen (18), and we do not knowingly collect Personal Information from individuals under 18.
privacyPolicy.text114: Your Personal Information may be stored and processed in any country where we have facilities or in which we engage service providers, and by using the Services you understand that your information will be transferred to countries outside of your country of residence, including the United States, which may have data protection rules that are different from those of your country.  In certain circumstances, courts, law enforcement agencies, regulatory agencies or security authorities in those other countries may be entitled to access your Personal Information.

privacyPolicy.text150: As described above, we use these categories of Personal Information to operate, manage, and maintain our business, to provide our products and services, and to accomplish our business purposes and objectives, including using Personal Information to:
privacyPolicy.text151: Fulfill your requests and respond to your inquiries;

privacyPolicy.text154: Conduct research, analytics, data analysis, data aggregation, and data anonymization;

privacyPolicy.text156: Conduct risk and security control and monitoring, and detect and prevent fraud;
privacyPolicy.text157: Perform identity verification, accounting, audit, and other internal functions, such as internal investigations and record-keeping;
privacyPolicy.text158: Carry out corporate transactions, such as mergers, joint ventures or acquisitions; and
privacyPolicy.text159: Comply with law, legal process, and internal policies, and exercise and defend legal claims.
privacyPolicy.text161: If you are a California resident, you may request that we:
privacyPolicy.text162: Disclose to you the following information covering the 12 months preceding your request:
privacyPolicy.text163: The categories of Personal Information we collected about you and the categories of sources from which we collected such Personal Information;
